title: Relics of Moria (1R195)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Moria
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Plays to your support area. Shadow: Remove (2) to play a [Moria] possession from your discard pile.
Lore:	“By both the doors they could now see that many bones were lying, and among them were broken swords and axe-heads, and cloven shields and helms.”
Rarity:	R
Notes:	Lists: ERL, MXL
